cause.description:
In the past, claims of free energy devices were diminished by the skepticism of both scientific and public communities. And, generally, with good reason. But now thanks to companies like Steorn, this technology is soon to be commercially produced.
Help promote the common knowledge of this technology by inviting everyone to this cause.
1. Further the knowledge of existing free energy technology
2. Support Steorn in the technology they are developing
cause.mission: help promote magnetic propulsion motors, and other forms of legitimate free energy technology.
cause.name: Freedom for Free Energy
